revised_title: Antarctic Magnetism Observations in the Southern Hemisphere
tldr: Lieut. Colonel Sabine's observations on terrestrial magnetism during the Antarctic Expedition on board Her Majesty's ships Erebus and Terror reveal a duplicate system of magnetic phenomena in the southern hemisphere, similar to the northern hemisphere. The study also confirms that the spaces in the Southern Pacific undergo a translation movement from east to west, opposite to the direction in the northern hemisphere.
